name: AMR-Solver
tagline: Block-based Octree AMR grid flow solver
body:
# AMR-Solver - General advection solver on AMR grids

 * Octree data structure 
 * Block-based AMR
 * Dynamic mesh generation

## Documentation 
[Link](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/suhasjains/AMR-Solver/blob/master/documentation/html/index.html)

## Sample mesh output
![Gradient based refinement with block nesting.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/suhasjains/AMR-Solver/master/images/gradientadapt.png)
![Gradient based refinement with block nesting.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/suhasjains/AMR-Solver/master/images/gradient.png)

## Changelog
 * Add neighbors - done
 * boundary flags - done
 * Make neighbors vary in refinement by 2 at the max - done
 * Add linked list for every level - done
 * Gradient based refinement - done
 * Input file - done
 * Output file
 * Multigrid implementation
 * Parallel implementation
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
